website_summaries.verdict: A naturally processed and spa-like treatment for most skin types and conditions.
pros: Provides immediate results for many skin and hair conditions
Heals extreme ailments such as chapped skin
Absorbs quickly into skin with non-greasy, glowing results
Easily combined with current skincare products with no lingering smell
cons: Delivers natural results, but not overnight miracles
